contents.text: Thank you for calling Google in San Francisco, your leader in search, artificial intelligence, cloud computing, and advertising.
For assistance with Google consumer products and services, press 1.
For help with your Google Account, password resets, or security settings, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you with a Google Account support specialist.

navigationGoals: Reset my Google account password and regain access.
I need to reset my Google Account password and secure my account after suspicious login attempts.
I need to recover my Google Account after losing my two-factor authentication device and update my OAuth settings.
I can’t remember my Google password and need to secure my account.
I forgot my Google Account password and need to regain access to my student email.

contents.text: For support with Google services such as Search, Gmail, or Maps, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to a Google product support representative.

navigationGoals: Fix an issue where I’m not receiving emails in Gmail.
I need assistance sharing my real-time location via Google Maps so my support network can track me.
I need assistance configuring OAuth scopes for the Gmail API in my consumer project.
I need help using Google Maps to get walking directions to my doctor’s office.
My Gmail won’t sync on my phone, and I can’t retrieve my lecture materials.

contents.text: For business and enterprise solutions including Google Cloud and advertising, press 2.
For Google Cloud Platform and infrastructure support, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you with our Google Cloud support team.

navigationGoals: Troubleshoot why my Compute Engine instance won’t start on GCP.
I need help configuring a Compute Engine instance for my small business website on Google Cloud Platform.
I need to troubleshoot a Compute Engine instance connectivity issue in my Google Cloud Platform environment.
I need help understanding my Google Cloud bill and checking my storage usage.
I need assistance setting up a Compute Engine VM on Google Cloud for my physics simulations.

contents.text: For Google Ads, marketing, and enterprise advertising solutions, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you with our Google Ads support team.

navigationGoals: Resolve why my Google Ads campaign isn’t getting impressions.
I need help setting up a new Google Ads campaign to promote my veteran-owned consulting firm.
I need help integrating the Google Ads API for automated bidding in my enterprise campaign.
I need help reviewing and adjusting my Google Ads campaign budget.
I want to create a Google Ads campaign to recruit participants for my research survey.
